section.section: When registered with the Administration, every passenger motor vehicle operated for the transportation of persons for hire, except a vehicle described in paragraph (2) of this subsection, is a Class B (for hire) vehicle.

The following vehicles are not subject to the classification specified in this section:
Any vehicle operated on a regular schedule and between fixed termini; and
Any vehicle for which a different classification is specified in this part.

text.section: For each Class B (for hire) vehicle, the annual registration fee is $150.00.
